features: Multifunctional Face Cleanser: The Infina Essentials Facial Cleanser acts as a cleanser face wash and facial cleanser face, offering the benefits of a face cleanser for oily skin and a gentle cleanser for face, serving both men and women equally

Inclusive Facial Cleansing Solution: Our face cleaner is suitable for all, from a facial cleanser for sensitive skin to a face wash for women, promising the best facial cleanser experience. This daily facial cleanser becomes a must-have in your routine

Advanced Facial Toner: Our facial toner works as a glycolic acid and salicylic acid toner for face, offering targeted benefits. Ideal as a face toner for acne-prone skin and a face toner for women anti-aging, providing comprehensive skin care

Beauty Kit Essentials: This beauty kit for women combines the benefits of a face toner and facial cleaner. Our skin care kit makes for a wonderful addition to facial skin care products, ensuring a complete skincare routine for all, including teen girls

Comprehensive Skin Care Set: This skin care set pairs the best facial cleanser and toner for face, offering a potent duo for radiant skin. Our facial cleansing products work in harmony, making this skin care kit a fundamental part of beauty kits for women

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Papaya Extract: Brightens the complexion. Papaya extract is packed with enzymes and antioxidants that are known to promote renewal process and reveal a youthful glow Aloe Vera: Soothes the skin Aloe vera is known for its soothing and deeply hydrating properties that leaves your skin healthy and revitalized Hyaluronic Acid: Softens skin texture. Hyaluronic acid is a powerful hydrator that helps plump the skin, improve elasticity, and create a smoother texture Green Tea Extract: Protects against environmental damage Green tea extract is rich in antioxidants that help protect the skin from environmental damage and promote a rejuvenated appearance.

Shake the bottle and apply Infina Cleanser onto your damp skin. Rinse off the cleanser thoroughly with lukewarm water, pat dry and apply a small amount of Infina Toner on your face. Allow the toner to dry naturally on your skin, and do not rinse it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter saw a difference on day 2. LOVE IT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A quality facial cleanser and toner…
reviews.reviewText: For many years, I have been really particular about facial cleansers and toners and consistently use them to keep my skin as healthy as possible.I have tried several different products in the past and a lot of times use different combinations of brands for different purposes.When I came across this set, the ingredients definitely were ones that I look for in facial products so I went ahead and place an order for it.I received them a few weeks ago and since using them, I am really seeing a nice difference.As far as the facial cleanser, it goes on a little bit thick, but a little goes a long way, and it gives my face a really nice fresh clean feeling after using it.The scent is not over bearing and definitely could be better, but it’s not terrible.It is not abrasive at all so even if your skin is a bit sensitive, it should not bother it at all. Mine tends to be sensitive and it has been holding up nicely.As far as the toner, it also has quality ingredients but I’m not 100% thrilled with it.The smell is really harsh, especially for the first several hours that it’s on.It also feels very sticky to me.It smells and feels like when you put on an artificial self tanner.But, when I clean my face after using it, I do see a slight bit of discoloration on the cotton, which tells me that it is definitely helping getting rid of dry skin.Overall, I am very pleased with this set and will continue to use it. I would definitely recommend it, and I think for the price it is a good value. I have definitely spend a lot more money than this to get similar results, so I’m very pleased with it.I hope my review helps you to make a more well informed decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i like this face cleanser it works very good and its good for the money and last a very long time it best for all ages and make you look young and good i definitely recommend this product .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Toner was opened and spilled in shipping box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set of facial products, big bottles, good cleanser and toner
reviews.reviewText: These are very substantial bottles of cleanser and toner that should last a long time. They came shrink wrapped together which assured me they hadn't been tampered with but otherwise did not have further tamper seals on the bottle. I notice about half my beauty products have seals and half do not, and it doesn't bother me one way or another. I used the cleanser in the shower and a small amount gave me a nice creamy wash all over my face. I used it on my closed eyes because allergies make me really want to wash my eyelids and I didn't experience any issues or stinging. It washed off easily. I only use toner sporadically - usually at night in place of a cleanser (lazy, I know, but I don't wear makeup, so it's fine) or mid-day if I get sweaty. Today I was working in the yard and so I used the toner to take the sweat off. It was pleasantly cooling, didn't sting, and didn't tighten my skin up or dry it out. The cotton ball did come away a bit dirty so I guess I was working hard. This is a good set and I will enjoy using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good facial cleansing duo!
reviews.reviewText: This review is for INFINA ESSENTIALS Face Cleanser and Facial Toner, this cleaning duo is made for the convenience of using 2 most used beauty products in any skincare routine: cleanser and toner. What I like is that the cleanser is suitable for all skin types even sensitive skin. However, it is a little on the dry side. So I wouldn't recommend this for dry skin. It contains salicylic acid, glycolic acid and natural extracts, which could be the reason why it really drys out your skin. Usually I use salicylic acid cleansers because my skin is acne prone and oily. So this cleanser works good for my skin. I just make sure that I moisturize afterwards. The toner is also packed with glycolic acid, salicylic acid and HA, making this suitable and effective for all skin types except dry skin in my opinion. Overall this is a decent cleansing duo for your everyday facial cleansing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No real standouts
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser toner combo was ok for me, but I didn’t find either one made that much of an improvement to my skin. They are gentle and did not irritate or dry out my skin.
